original_text: I will hear thee, said he, when thine accusers are also come. And he commanded him to be kept in Herod's judgment hall.
korean_text: 이르되 너를 고발하는 사람들이 오거든 네 말을 들으리라 하고 헤롯 궁에 그를 지키라 명하니라

sentences.original_text: I will hear thee, said he,
when thine accusers are also come.
to be kept in Herod's judgment hall.
